input.activity_signal: Company appears inactive based on: 1) Single FCC filing from 2019-05-21 with no recent activity, 2) Email contact using @logmein.com domain suggesting acquisition/integration, 3) Web search results show Jive services being offered through reseller (RQ Communications) rather than direct company presence, 4) No direct company website found in search results
input.product_summary: Jive Communications provided hosted VoIP and unified communications services to business customers, offering cloud-based voice solutions since 2006.
